sentences.en: Anyone who wants to avoid the flu should consider getting a vaccination.
sentences.cn: 如果不想得流感，就该考虑接种疫苗。

sentences.en: Doctors now fear a flu epidemic .
sentences.cn: 医生现在担心会出现流感大爆发。

sentences.en: He contracted Spanish flu, which almost killed him.
sentences.cn: 他得了西班牙流感，险些丧命。

sentences.en: He was recovering from a severe bout of flu.
sentences.cn: 他患了严重的流感，尚未痊愈。

sentences.en: I can personally attest that the cold and flu season is here.
sentences.cn: 感冒和流感季节来了，对此我有切身体会。

sentences.en: I couldn’t go because I had flu .
I spent a week in bed with flu.
sentences.cn: 我得了流感，一星期都卧病在床。

sentences.en: I was stuck at home with flu.
I'm glad that you're over the flu.
sentences.cn: 你的流感好了，我真高兴。

sentences.en: One of the office girls was down with the flu.
One pandemic of Spanish flu took nearly 22 million lives worldwide.
sentences.cn: 西班牙流感的大爆发夺去了全球近2,200万人的生命。

sentences.en: She thought she just had a touch of flu.
sentences.cn: 她认为自己仅仅有点感冒。

sentences.en: Steven’s still in bed with flu .
sentences.cn: 史蒂文患了流感，仍卧病在床。

sentences.en: Ten new cases of bird flu were reported yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天新增十例禽流感病例报告。

sentences.en: the outbreak of a flu epidemic
The whole family has the flu.
Three members of the band went down with flu.
sentences.cn: 这个乐队有3名成员得了流感。

phrases.tran_cn: 流感疫苗；预防针；感冒疫苗

trans.tran_en: a common illness that makes you feel very tired and weak, gives you a sore throat, and makes you cough and have to clear your nose a lot
